name: Lombardi's Revenge
description:
Lombardi's back, and he's more dangerous than ever.

Dodge rockets, blow shit up, and cause mayhem in Matador Records Laboratory as you fight your way to Lombardi, a money hungry wolf hiding in an inconspicuous giant robot. Will Trait and Stoney stop him from breaking their knees with a baseball bat? There's only one way to find out.

This is a fan game based on the band 1 Trait Danger. All of the music in this game is by them, and I would definitely encourage you to check them out. The game's characters and concepts are also based on their music, as well as one of their games, Lombardi's World.

Songs Used: TOO FAMOUS, Connected Schenectady, Unique, On Tour With Eddy (Yo Tengo), STFU, Saturday's for the Boys (Saturday Is for the Boys), All My Friends Are Dying, Softmore Slump, KURT, On the Run from Cossett (feat. Jimmy Fallon).

As a side note, this game is fairly short and therefore features no save system.
